reviewText:
Early Access Review

**Changed review to recomended, Dev is extremely quick at fixing bugs and adding new content!**

Current Features:
Seasons change, you can freeze without a fire or home to rest in.
Many different factions, different types of SpaceSpiders will attack eachother, and so will other survivors.
You can find Mini-forests" to plant crops in so they last longer.
Build a town and recruit survivors to be woodcutters
date:
hunters and have jobs.
Survivors and Villagers have to eat and sleep and will do jobs.
Underground system with dungeon crawling elements!
Fully randomized world and color each time you play! Seasons will be different each time!


Current Issues:
For Keyboard and Mouse players you have to hold "T" to change your tools
recommended: we should be able to press 1-2-3-4-5 to change tools quickly."
votesHelpful: 2 of 3 people (67%) found this review helpful
